name: Fromis_9 Saerom
description:

サンキュー!

modelVersions.name: Fromis_9 Saerom v.1 BETA
modelVersions.description:
Don't forget to use Trigger Word: "saerom"

Sometimes the eyes show crossed eyes.

You can fix it with inpaint or by adding "look at viewer" prompt.

Best Checkpoint: ChilloutMix,EdgeofRealism,& LofiV2

Clip Skip 1

"This version still beta"

meta.prompt: saerom,complex 3d render ultra detailed of a beautiful porcelain profile a skilled and tough female protagonist who finds herself in a challenging situation. She must use her expertise and resourcefulness to overcome obstacles and enemies while staying true to her values. Make the action scenes realistic and engaging, with plenty of physical challenges and narrow escapes. Include moments of introspection and character development to make the protagonist relatable and compelling. The setting should be stable but not too predictable, with unexpected twists and turns to keep the reader on their toes. Finally, use a diffuse writing style that conveys the protagonist's emotions and thoughts in a subtle and nuanced way.<lora:saerom:1>
